name: Birdspotting
description:
A simple game where you have to find and keep track of a bird.

No audio because I was too lazy.

Playing in Fullscreen is recommended.

Made using the following assets:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-103349

https://ma9ici4n.itch.io/pixel-art-bird-16x16
